ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is the fire kindled by God
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It is the Fire kindled by Allah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is a fierce fire created by God
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The fire of Allah, that is ablaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: It is the fire kindled by Allah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (It is) the fire of Allah, kindled,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is a Fire kindled by God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [It is] the fire of Allah, set ablaze,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (It is) the Fire of (the Wrath of) Allah kindled (to a blaze),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (It is) the kindled Fire of Allah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [104:6] [It is] the fire of God, kindled, set ablaze,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then He explained, saying: ((It is) the Fire of Allah, kindled) for the disbelievers,
